anya-e0809n3:3_0: Puraṁ nagara mitthī vā, ṭhānīyaṁ puṭabhedanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:4_0: Thiyaṁ tu rājadhānī rājaṭhānī (ṭī.) ca, khandhāvāro bhave tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:6_0: Sākhānagara maññatra, yaṁ taṁ mūlapurā puraṁ;
anya-e0809n3:7_0: Bārāṇasī ca sāvatthi, vesālī mithilā, ḷavī.
anya-e0809n3:9_0: Kosambu, jjeniyo takka, silā campā ca sāgalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:10_0: Susumāragiraṁ saṁsumāra (ṭīkā) rāja, gahaṁ kapilavatthu ca.
anya-e0809n3:15_0: Racchā ca visikhā vuttā, rathikā vīthi cāpyatha;
anya-e0809n3:16_0: Byūho racchā anibbiddhā, nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca.
anya-e0809n3:18_0: Catukkaṁ caccare magga, sandhi siṅghāṭakaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:19_0: Pākāro varaṇo cātha, udāpo uddāpa, uddāpa upakārikā.
anya-e0809n3:21_0: Kuṭṭaṁ tu bhitti nārī tha, gopuraṁ dvārakoṭṭhako;
anya-e0809n3:22_0: Esikā indakhīlo ca, aṭṭo tvaṭṭālako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:24_0: Toraṇaṁ tu bahidvāraṁ, parikhātu ca dīghikā;
anya-e0809n3:25_0: Mandiraṁ sadanā, gāraṁ, nikāyo nilayā, layo.
anya-e0809n3:30_0: Okaṁ sālā khayo vāso, thiyaṁ kuṭi vasatya’pi;
anya-e0809n3:31_0: Gehañcā, nitthi sadumaṁ, cetiyā, yatanāni tu.
anya-e0809n3:33_0: Pāsādo ceva yūpo tha, muṇḍacchado ca hammiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:40_0: Sabhāyañca sabhā cātha, maṇḍapaṁ vā janālayo;
anya-e0809n3:53_0: Gabbho ovarako vāsā, gāraṁ tu sayaniggahaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:55_0: Itthāgāraṁ tu orodho, suddhanto’ ntepurampi ca;
anya-e0809n3:62_0: Ālokasandhi vutto tha, laṅgī’tthī paligho bhave;
anya-e0809n3:65_0: Chadanaṁ paṭalaṁ chadda, majiraṁ caccaro, ṅgaṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:68_0: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṁ dvāra, bāhā kūṭaṁ tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n3:69_0: Dvārañca paṭihāro tha, ummāro dehanī, tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:71_0: Eḷako indakhīlo tha, thambho thūṇo pumitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:72_0: Pāṭikā, ḍḍhendupāsāṇe, giñjakā tu ca iṭṭhakā.
anya-e0809n3:80_0: Saṅghāto pakkhapāso ca, mandiraṅgā tulā api;
anya-e0809n3:81_0: Thiyaṁ sammujjanī ceva, sammajjanī ca sodhanī.
anya-e0809n3:84_0: Atho kacavaro, klāpo, saṅkāro ca kasambupi.
anya-e0809n3:86_0: Gharādibhūmi taṁ vatthu, gāmo saṁvasatho tha so;
anya-e0809n3:87_0: Pākaṭo nigamo bhoga, maccādibhyo dhi tūdito ‘adhibhū’ti īrito kathito (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:94_0: Manusso mānuso macco, mānavo manujo naro;
anya-e0809n3:98_0: Budho vidvā vibhāvī ca, santo sappañña kovidā;
anya-e0809n3:99_0: Dhīmā sudhī kavi byatto, vicakkhaṇo visārado.
anya-e0809n3:101_0: Medhāvī matimā pañño, viññū ca vidūro vidū;
anya-e0809n3:102_0: Dhīro vipassī dosaññū, buddho ca dabba viddasu.
anya-e0809n3:104_0: Itthī sīmantinī nārī, thī vadhū vanitā, ṅganā;
anya-e0809n3:105_0: Pamadā sundarī kantā, ramaṇī dayitā, balā.
anya-e0809n3:107_0: Mātugāmo ca mahilā, lalanā bhīru kāminī;
anya-e0809n3:108_0: Kumārikā tu kaññā tha, yuvatī taruṇī bhave.
anya-e0809n3:112_0: Dhavatthinī tu saṅketaṁ, yāti yā sā, bhisārikā.
anya-e0809n3:115_0: Rūpūpajīvinī vesī, kulaṭā tu ca bandhakī.
anya-e0809n3:121_0: Vijātā tu pasūtā ca, jātāpaccā pasūtikā.
anya-e0809n3:123_0: Dūtī sañcārikā dāsī, tu ceṭī kuṭadhārikā;
anya-e0809n3:124_0: Vāruṇī, kkhaṇikā tulyā, khattiyānī tu khattiyā.
anya-e0809n3:126_0: Dāro jāyā kalattañca, gharaṇī bhariyā piyā,
anya-e0809n3:129_0: Sakhī tvā’lī vayassā tha, jārī cevā’ticārinī;
anya-e0809n3:130_0: Pume tū’tu rajo pupphaṁ, utunī tu rajassalā.
anya-e0809n3:135_0: Dhavotu sāmiko bhattā, kanto pati varo piyo;
anya-e0809n3:143_1: jayampatī tu dampatī dampatīti padaṁ pulliṅga bahuvacanantaṁ ikārantaṁ,
anya-e0809n3:144_0: Atha vassavaro vutto, paṇḍako ca napuṁsakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:146_0: Bandhavo bandhu sajano, sagotto ñāti ñātako;
anya-e0809n3:150_0: Amma, mbā jananī mātā, janetti janikā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:160_0: Nattā vutto paputto tha, sāmibhātā tu devaro;
anya-e0809n3:168_0: Sodariyo sagabbho ca, sodaro sahajo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:169_0: Mātāpitū te pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro.
anya-e0809n3:172_0: Bālattaṁ bālatā bālyaṁ, yobbaññaṁtu ca yobbanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:174_0: Sukkā tu palitaṁ kesā, dayo tha jaratā jarā;
anya-e0809n3:175_0: Puthuko pillako chāpo, kumāro bāla potakā.
anya-e0809n3:179_0: Taruṇo ca vayaṭṭho ca, daharo ca yuvā susu;
anya-e0809n3:182_0: Mahallako ca vuddho ca, thero jiṇṇo ca jiṇṇako;
anya-e0809n3:183_0: Aggajo pubbajo jeṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho nujo.
anya-e0809n3:187_0: Sīso’ttamaṅgāni siro, muddhā ca matthako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:188_0: Keso tu kuntalo vālo, ttamaṅgaruha muddhajā.
anya-e0809n3:197_0: Sīmanto tu mato nāri, kesamajjhamhi paddhati.
anya-e0809n3:199_0: Lomaṁ tanuruhaṁ romaṁ, pamhaṁ pakhuma makkhigaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:200_0: Massu vuttaṁ pumamukhe, bhū tvitthī bhamuko bhamu.
anya-e0809n3:203_0: Vadanaṁ tu mukhaṁ tuṇḍaṁ, vattaṁ lapana mānanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:205_0: Dvijo lapanajo danto, dasano radano rado;
anya-e0809n3:209_0: Gaṇḍo kapolo hanvitthī gaṇḍatthī (ṭī.) hanvatthī=hanu+itthī; hana+u (ṇvādi),
anya-e0809n3:212_0: Galo ca kaṇṭho gīvā ca, kandharā ca sirodharā;
anya-e0809n3:214_0: Aṅkitā tīhi lekhāhi, kambugīvā thavā matā.
anya-e0809n3:216_0: Aṁso nitthī bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu taṁ;
anya-e0809n3:217_0: Bāhumūlaṁ tu kaccho, dho, tva’ssa passa manitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:219_0: Bāhu bhujādvīsu bāhā, hattho tu kara pāṇayo;
anya-e0809n3:223_0: Karasākhā, ṅgulī tā tu, pañca, ṅguṭṭho ca tajjanī;
anya-e0809n3:224_0: Majjhimā nāmikā cāpi, kaniṭṭhā’ti kamā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:229_0: Ratanaṁ kukku hattho tha, pume karapuṭo,ñjali;
anya-e0809n3:230_0: Karajo tu nakho nitthī, khaṭako muṭṭhi ca dvīsu.
anya-e0809n3:235_0: Uro ca hadayaṁ cātha, thano kuca payodharā;
anya-e0809n3:236_0: Cūcukaṁ tu thanaggasmiṁ, piṭṭhaṁ tu piṭṭhi nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:238_0: Majjho’nitthī vilaggo ca, majjhimaṁ kucchi catukkaṁ udare; 944-gāthāpi passitabbā tu dvisu;
anya-e0809n3:241_0: Jaghanaṁ tu nitambo ca, soṇī ca kaṭi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:248_0: Asuci sambhavo sukkaṁ, pāyu tu purise gudaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:249_0: Vā pume gūtha karīsa, vaccāni ca malaṁ chakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:251_0: Uccāro mīḷha mukkāro, passāvo mutta muccate;
anya-e0809n3:254_0: Dvīsvadho nābhiyā vatthi, ucchaṅga’ṅkā tu’bho pume;
anya-e0809n3:255_0: Ūru satthi pume ūru, pabbaṁ tu jāṇu jaṇṇu ca.
anya-e0809n3:257_0: Gopphako pādagaṇṭhipi, pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi;
anya-e0809n3:258_0: Pādaggaṁ papado pādo, tu pado caraṇañca vā.
anya-e0809n3:261_0: Paṇḍake aṭṭhi dhātvitthī, galantaṭṭhi tu akkhako.
anya-e0809n3:263_0: Kapparo tu kapālaṁ vā, kaṇḍarā tu mahāsirā;
anya-e0809n3:264_0: Pume nhāru citthī sirā, dhamanī tha rasaggasā.
anya-e0809n3:267_0: Tiliṅgikaṁ tu vallūra, muttattaṁ atha lohitaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:269_0: Rudhiraṁ soṇitaṁ rattaṁ, lālā kheḷo elā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:270_0: Purise māyu pittañca, semho nitthī silesumo.
anya-e0809n3:272_0: Vasā vilīnasneho tha, medo ceva vapā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:273_0: Ākappo veso nepacchaṁ, maṇḍanaṁ tu pasādhanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:284_0: Kaṅkaṇaṁ karabhūsā tha, kiṅkiṇī kiṁkaṇī kiṁ kaṇikā (ka.) khuddaghaṇṭikā;
anya-e0809n3:285_0: Aṅgulīyaka maṅgulyā, bharaṇaṁ, sākkharaṁ tu taṁ.
anya-e0809n3:295_0: Cela macchādanaṁ vatthaṁ, vāso vasana maṁsukaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:296_0: Ambarañca paṭo nitthī, dussaṁ colo ca sāṭako.
anya-e0809n3:298_0: Khomaṁ dukūlaṁ koseyyaṁ, pattuṇṇaṁ kambalo ca vā;
anya-e0809n3:299_0: Sāṇaṁ koṭamburaṁ bhaṅga, ntyādi vatthantaraṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:304_0: Uttarīya matho vattha, mahatanti mataṁ navaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:305_0: Nantakaṁ kappaṭo jiṇṇa, vasanaṁ tu paṭaccaraṁ.
anya-e0809n3:307_0: Kañcuko vāravāṇaṁ vā, tha vatthāvayave dasā;
anya-e0809n3:313_0: Arahaddhajo ca kāsāya, kāsāvāni ca cīvaraṁ;
anya-e0809n3:316_0: Phala,ttaca, kimi, romā, nyetā vatthassa yoniyo;
anya-e0809n3:317_0: Phālaṁ kappāsikaṁ tīsu, khomādī tu tacabbhavā.
anya-e0809n3:319_0: Koseyyaṁ kimijaṁ, roma, mayaṁ tu kambalaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:325_0: Visesako tu tilako, tyūbho nitthī ca cittakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:326_0: Candano nitthiyaṁ gandha, sāro malayajo pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:337_0: Yakkhadhūpo sajjulaso, takkolaṁ tu ca kolakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:338_0: Kosaphala matho jāti, kosaṁ jātiphalaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:341_0: Alattako yāvako ca, lākhā jatu napuṁsake.
anya-e0809n3:343_0: Sirivāso tu sarala, ddavo’ ñjanaṁ tu kajjalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:347_0: Mālā mālyaṁ pupphadāme pupphaṁ dāmaṁ (ka.), bhāvitaṁ vāsitaṁ tisu.
anya-e0809n3:350_0: Seyyā ca sayanaṁ senaṁ, pallaṅko tu ca mañcako.
anya-e0809n3:357_0: Bibbohanaṁ co’ padhānaṁ, pīṭhikā pīṭha māsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:358_0: Kocchaṁ tu bhaddapīṭhe thā, sandī pīṭhantare matā.
anya-e0809n3:364_0: Ghanapupphaṁ paṭalikā, setaṁ tu paṭikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:370_0: Kaṭṭissaṁ koseyyaṁ ratana, parisibbita mattharaṇaṁ kamā;
anya-e0809n3:373_0: Dīpo padīpo pajjoto, pume tvādāsa dappaṇā;
anya-e0809n3:374_0: Geṇḍuko kaṇḍuko tāla, vaṇṭaṁ tu bījanītthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:376_0: Caṅkoṭako karaṇḍo ca, samuggo sampuṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:379_0: Vivāho payamā pāṇi, ggaho pariṇayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:382_0: Khujjo ca gaṇḍulo rassa, vāmanā tu lakuṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:387_0: Kuṇī hatthādivaṅko ca, valiro tu ca kekaro.
anya-e0809n3:397_0: Ātaṅko āmayo byādhi, gado rogo rujāpi ca;
anya-e0809n3:403_0: Ñeyyaṁ tva’ru vaṇo nitthī, phoṭo tu piḷakā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:405_0: Pubbo pūyo tha rattāti, sāro pakkhandikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:409_0: Kaṇḍū kaṇḍūti kaṇḍūyā, khajju kaṇḍūvanaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:411_0: Pāmaṁ vitacchikā kacchu, sotho tu sayathū’dito;
anya-e0809n3:415_0: Visūcikā iti mahā, vireko tha bhagandalo bhagandaro (ka.).
anya-e0809n3:417_0: Meho jaro kāsa sāsā, kuṭṭhaṁ sūlāmayantarā;
anya-e0809n3:418_0: Vutto vejjo bhisakko ca, rogahārī tikicchako.
anya-e0809n3:421_0: Bhesajja magado ceva, bhesajaṁ mo’sadhaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:429_0: Kulaṁ vaṁso ca santānā, bhijanā gotta manvayo;
anya-e0809n3:430_0: Thiyaṁ santatya tho vaṇṇā, cattāro khattiyādayo.
anya-e0809n3:434_0: Rājā bhūpati bhūpālo, patthivo ca narādhipo.
anya-e0809n3:442_0: Pume licchavi vajjī ca, sakyo tu sākiyo tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:443_0: Bhaddakaccānā bhaddā kaccānā (ṭī.) rāhula, mātā bimbā yasodharā.
anya-e0809n3:452_0: Vaḷañje ca gahapati, mahāsālā dhane siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:455_0: Sajīvo sacivā, macco, senānī tu camūpati.
anya-e0809n3:461_0: Kañcukī sovidallo ca, anujīvī tu sevako.
anya-e0809n3:467_0: Amitto ripu verī ca, sapattā rāti satva’ri; (Sattu+ari)
anya-e0809n3:471_0: Viddesī ca diso diṭṭho,thā nurodho nuvattanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:473_0: Mitto nitthī vayasso ca, sahāyo suhajjo (ṭī.) suhado sakhā;
anya-e0809n3:477_0: Dūto tu sandesaharo, gaṇako tu muhuttiko.
anya-e0809n3:479_0: Lekhako lipikāro ca, vaṇṇo tu akkharo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:480_0: Bhedo daṇḍo sāma dānā, nyupāyā caturo ime.
anya-e0809n3:482_0: Upajāpotu bhedo ca, daṇḍo tu sāhasaṁ damo;
anya-e0809n3:484_0: Sāmya’ macco sakhā koso, duggañca vijitaṁ balaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:487_0: Pabhāvu’ssāha, mantānaṁ, vasā tisso hi sattiyo;
anya-e0809n3:491_0: Manto ca mantanaṁ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
anya-e0809n3:492_0: Tigocaro tu chakkaṇṇo, rahassaṁ guyha muccate.
anya-e0809n3:494_0: Tīsu vivitta vijana, channā, raho raho byayaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:499_0: Āṇā ca sāsanaṁ ñeyyaṁ, uddānaṁ tu ca bandhanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:501_0: Āgu vutta mantu (ka.) maparādho, karo tu bali muccate;
anya-e0809n3:502_0: Puṇṇapatto tuṭṭhidāyo, upadā tu ca pābhataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:505_0: Suṅkaṁ tvanitthī gumbādi, deyye thā’yo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0809n3:507_0: Ātapattaṁ tathā chattaṁ, raññaṁ tu hemamāsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:508_0: Sīhāsanaṁ atho vāḷa, bījanītthī ca cāmaraṁ.
anya-e0809n3:510_0: Khaggo ca chatta muṇhīsaṁ, pādukā vālabījanī;
anya-e0809n3:516_0: Kuñjaro vāraṇo hatthī, mātaṅgo dvirado gajo;
anya-e0809n3:520_0: Kāḷāvaka gaṅgeyyā, paṇḍara tambā ca piṅgalo gandho;
anya-e0809n3:524_0: Kalabho ceva bhiṅkotha, pabhinno matta gajjitā;
anya-e0809n3:525_0: Hatthighaṭā tu gajatā, hatthīnī tu kareṇukā.
anya-e0809n3:536_0: Majjhamhi bandhanaṁ kacchā, kappano tu kuthādayo.
anya-e0809n3:538_0: Opavayho rājavayho, sajjito tu ca kappito;
anya-e0809n3:541_0: Tuttaṁ tu kaṇṇamūlamhi, matthakamhi tu aṅkuso;
anya-e0809n3:554_0: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅko tha, javano ca javādhiko;
anya-e0809n3:555_0: Mukhādhānaṁ khalīno vā, kasā tva ssābhitāḷinī.
anya-e0809n3:557_0: Kusā tu nāsarajjumhi, vaḷavā’ssā khuro saphaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:558_0: Puccha manitthī naṅguṭṭhaṁ, vālahattho ca vāladhi.
anya-e0809n3:560_0: Sandano ca ratho phussa, ratho tu naraṇāya so;
anya-e0809n3:564_0: Sivikā yāpyayānañcā, nitthī tu sakaṭo pya’naṁ (sakaṭo pi+anaṁ);
anya-e0809n3:565_0: Cakkaṁ rathaṅga mākhyātaṁ, tassanto nemi nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:567_0: Tammajjhe piṇḍikā nābhi, kubbaro tu yugandharo;
anya-e0809n3:570_0: Dhuro mukhe rathassaṅgā, tva kkho pakkharaādayo;
anya-e0809n3:573_0: Rathacārī tu sūto ca, pājitā ceva sārathī;
anya-e0809n3:577_0: Padāti pattī tu pume, padago padiko mato;
anya-e0809n3:578_0: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṁ, kavaco vā uracchado.
anya-e0809n3:580_0: Jālikā tha ca sannaddho, sajjo ca vammiko bhave;
anya-e0809n3:584_0: Javano turito vegī, jetabbaṁ jeyya muccate.
anya-e0809n3:586_0: Sūra vīrā tu vikkanto, sahāyo nucaro samā;
anya-e0809n3:587_0: Sannaddhappabhutī tīsu, pātheyyaṁ tu ca sambalaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:589_0: Vāhinī dhajinī senā, camū cakkaṁ balaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n3:603_0: Sampatti sampadā lakkhī, sirī vipatti āpadā;
anya-e0809n3:604_0: Athā vudhañca āyudhantipi pāṭho heti’tthī, satthaṁ paharaṇaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:612_0: Issāso dhanu kodaṇḍaṁ, cāpo nitthī sarāsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:616_0: Vāṇo kaṇḍa musu dvīsu, khurappo urappo (ka.) tejanā’sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:617_0: Tūṇītthiyaṁ kalāpo ca, tūṇo tūṇīra vāṇadhi.
anya-e0809n3:619_0: Pakkho tu vājo diddho tu, visappito saro bhave;
anya-e0809n3:622_0: Maṇḍalaggo tu nettiṁso, asi khaggo ca sāyako;
anya-e0809n3:625_0: Kheṭakaṁ phalakaṁ cammaṁ, illī tu karapālikā;
anya-e0809n3:626_0: Churikā satya’siputtī, laguḷo tu ca muggaro.
anya-e0809n3:628_0: Sallo nitthi saṅku pume, vāsī tu tacchanītthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:631_0: Kaṇayo bhindivāḷo ca, cakkaṁ kunto gadā tathā;
anya-e0809n3:635_0: Niyyānaṁ gamanaṁ yātrā, paṭṭhānañca gamo gati;
anya-e0809n3:636_0: Cuṇṇo paṁsu rajo ceva, dhūlī’tthī reṇu ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n3:638_0: Māgadho madhuko vutto, vandī tu thutipāṭhako;
anya-e0809n3:642_0: Ketu dhajo paṭākā ca, kadalī ketanaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:645_0: Balaṁ thāmo sahaṁ satti, vikkamo tvatisūratā;
anya-e0809n3:646_0: Raṇe jitassa yaṁ pānaṁ, jayapānanti taṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:648_0: Saṅgāmo sampahāro cā, nitthiyaṁ samaraṁ raṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:651_0: Bhaṇḍanaṁ tu vivādo ca, viggaho kalaha medhagā;
anya-e0809n3:658_0: Nibbuddhaṁniyuddhaṁ (ka.) mallayuddhamhi, jayo tu vijayo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:662_0: Hiṁsanaṁ saraṇaṁ hiṁsā, vadho sasana ghātanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:665_0: Nidhano nitthiyaṁ nāso, kālo’nto cavanaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:675_0: Kārā tu bandhanāgāraṁ, kāraṇā tu ca yātanā.
anya-e0809n3:678_0: Brahmabandhu dvijo vippo, brahmā bhovādī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0809n3:682_0: Brahmacārī gahaṭṭho ca, vanappattho ca bhikkhuti;
anya-e0809n3:686_0: Upajjhāyo upajjhā thā, cariyo nissayadādiko nissayadāyako (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:688_0: Upanīyā thavā pubbaṁ, veda majjhāpaye dvijo;
anya-e0809n3:689_0: Yo saṅgaṁ sarahassañcā, cariyo brāhmaṇesu so.
anya-e0809n3:692_0: Yāgo tu katu yañño tha, vedītthī bhū parikkhatā.
anya-e0809n3:694_0: Assamedho ca purisa, medho ceva niraggaḷo;
anya-e0809n3:695_0: Sammāpāso vājapeyya, miti yāgā mahā ime.
anya-e0809n3:699_0: Parisā sabhā samajjā ca, tathā samiti saṁsado.
anya-e0809n3:701_0: Catasso parisā bhikkhu, bhikkhunī ca upāsakā;
anya-e0809n3:702_0: Upāsikāyoti imā, thavā ṭṭha parisā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:708_0: Vedāna mādibhūtaṁ sā, sāvittī tipadaṁ siyā.
anya-e0809n3:710_0: Habyapāke caru mato, sujā tu homadabbiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:711_0: Paramannaṁ tu pāyāso, habyaṁ tu havi kathyate.
anya-e0809n3:713_0: Yūpo thūṇāyaṁ nimmantya, dārumhi tva’raṇī dvisu;
anya-e0809n3:719_0: Pañca mahāpariccāgo, vutto seṭṭha, dhanassa ca;
anya-e0809n3:720_0: Vasena putta dārānaṁ, rajjassa’ ṅgāna meva ca.
anya-e0809n3:722_0: Annaṁ pānaṁ gharaṁ vatthaṁ, yānaṁ mālā vilepanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:723_0: Gandho seyyā padīpeyyaṁ, dānavatthū siyuṁ dasa.
anya-e0809n3:726_0: Pitudānaṁ tu nivāpo, saddhaṁ tu taṁva sātthato.
anya-e0809n3:728_0: Pume atithi āgantu, pāhunā vesikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:729_0: Aññattha gantu micchanto, gamiko thā ggha magghiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:740_0: Upāsanaṁ tu sussūsā, sā pāricariyā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:742_0: Mona mabhāsanaṁ tuṇhī, bhāvo tha paṭipāṭi sā;
anya-e0809n3:745_0: Tapo ca saṁyamo sīlaṁ, niyamo tu vatañca vā;
anya-e0809n3:751_0: Yo pāpehi upāvatto, vāso saddhiṁ guṇehi so;
anya-e0809n3:755_0: Vācaṁyamo tu muni ca, tāpaso tu isī rito.
anya-e0809n3:764_0: Aññā tu arahattañca, thūpo tu cetiyaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:765_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko ca, ānando dve samā tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:769_0: Bhikkhupi sāmaṇero ca, sikkhamānā ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0809n3:772_0: Patto ticīvaraṁ kāya, bandhanaṁ vāsi sūci ca;
anya-e0809n3:775_0: Sāmaṇero ca samaṇu, ddeso cātha digambaro;
anya-e0809n3:776_0: Aceḷako nigaṇṭho ca, jaṭilo tu jaṭādharo.
anya-e0809n3:781_0: Pavitto payato pūto, cammaṁ tu ajinaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:791_0: Vesso ca vesiyāno tha, jīvanaṁ vutti jīvikā;
anya-e0809n3:797_0: Khettājīvo kassako tha, khettaṁ kedāra muccate;
anya-e0809n3:800_0: Dāttaṁ lavitta masitaṁ ‘‘asita’’ saddo puṁnapuṁsake-1005-gāthā passitabbā, patodo tutta pājanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:801_0: Yottaṁ tu rajju rasmitthī, phālo tu kasako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:804_0: Sammā tu yugakīlasmiṁ, sītā tu halapaddhati.
anya-e0809n3:807_0: Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
anya-e0809n3:808_0: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā.
anya-e0809n3:813_0: Atha kaṅgu piyaṅgu’tthī, ummā tu atasī bhave;
anya-e0809n3:814_0: Kiṭṭhañca sassaṁ dhaññañca viññeyyaṁ (ṭī.), vīhi thambakarī thambhakarī (ka.) rito.
anya-e0809n3:816_0: Kaṇḍo tu nāḷa matha so, palālaṁ nitthi nipphalo;
anya-e0809n3:817_0: Bhusaṁ kaliṅgaro cātha, thuso dhaññattace tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:821_0: Khalo ca dhaññakaraṇaṁ, thambothambho (ka.) gumbo tiṇādinaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:823_0: Ayoggo musalo nitthī, kullo suppa manitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:824_0: Atho’ddhanañca culli’tthī, kilañjo tu kaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:827_0: Kolambo cātha maṇikaṁ, bhāṇako ca arañjaro.
anya-e0809n3:829_0: Ghaṭo dvīsu kuṭo nitthī, kumbho kalasa, vārakā;
anya-e0809n3:830_0: Kaṁso bhuñjanapatto thā, mattaṁ patto ca bhājanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:832_0: Aṇḍupakaṁ cumbaṭakaṁ, sarāvo tu ca mallako;
anya-e0809n3:836_0: Mahosadhaṁ tu taṁ sukkhaṁ, maricaṁ tu ca kolakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:839_0: Dhaññambilaṁ biḷaṅgo tha, lavaṇaṁ loṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n3:841_0: Sāmuddaṁ sindhavo nitthī, kāḷaloṇaṁ tu ubbhidaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:842_0: Biḷakaṁ biḷāla (ka.) ceti pañcete, pabhedā lavaṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n3:844_0: Guḷo ca phāṇitaṁ khaṇḍo, macchaṇḍī sakkharā iti;
anya-e0809n3:847_0: Lājā siyā’kkhataṁ cātha, dhānā bhaṭṭhayave bhave;
anya-e0809n3:848_0: Abaddhasattu mantho ca, pūpā’ pūpā tu piṭṭhako.
anya-e0809n3:851_0: Odaniko ca rasako, sūpo tu byañjanaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:853_0: Odano vā kuraṁ bhattaṁ, bhikkhā cā’nna mathā sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:857_0: Khajjaṁ tu bhojja leyyāni, peyyanti catudhā’sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:862_0: Vighāsādo ca damako, pipāsā tu ca tassanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:865_0: Udreko ceva uggāro, sohiccaṁ titti tappanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:872_0: Uttamaṇṇo ca dhaniko, dhamaṇṇo tu iṇāyiko.
anya-e0809n3:874_0: Uddhāro tu iṇaṁ vuttaṁ, mūlaṁ tu pābhataṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:880_0: Saṅkhyāne tu ca saṅkhyeyye, ekatte vīsatādayo;
anya-e0809n3:883_0: Sataṁ sahassaṁ niyutaṁ nahutaṁ-nayutaṁ (katthaci), lakkhaṁ koṭi pakoṭiyo;
anya-e0809n3:887_0: Ahahaṁ ababaṁ cevā, ṭaṭaṁ sogandhi kuppalaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:898_0: Tulā, pattha, ṅguli, vasā, tidhā māna matho siyā.
anya-e0809n3:902_0: Dve akkhā māsakā pañca, kkhānaṁ dharaṇamaṭṭhakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:904_0: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṁ, nikkhaṁ tvanitthi pañca te;
anya-e0809n3:905_0: Pādo bhāge catutthe tha, dharaṇāni palaṁ dasa.
anya-e0809n3:907_0: Tulā palasataṁ cātha, bhāro vīsati tā tulā;
anya-e0809n3:918_0: Āḷhako nitthiyaṁ tumbho, patthotu nāḷi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:924_0: Dabbaṁ vittaṁ sāpateyyaṁ, vasva’ttho vibhavo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:926_0: Koso hiraññañca katā, kataṁ kañcana, rūpiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:927_0: Kuppaṁ tadaññaṁ tambādi, rūpiyaṁ dvaya māhataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:929_0: Suvaṇṇaṁ kanakaṁ jāta, rūpaṁ soṇṇañca kañcanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:930_0: Satthuvaṇṇo harī kambu, cāru hemañca hāṭakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:932_0: Tapaniyaṁ hiraññaṁ ta, bbhedā cāmīkarampi ca;
anya-e0809n3:933_0: Sātakumbhaṁ tathā jambu, nadaṁ siṅgī ca nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:935_0: Rūpiyaṁ rajataṁ sajjhu, rūpī sajjhaṁ atho vasu;
anya-e0809n3:938_0: Suvaṇṇaṁ rajataṁ muttā, maṇi veḷuriyāni ca;
anya-e0809n3:941_0: Lohitaṅko ca paduma, rāgo rattamaṇi pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:942_0: Vaṁsavaṇṇo veḷuriyaṁ, pavāḷaṁ vā ca viddumo.
anya-e0809n3:944_0: Masāragallaṁ kabaramaṇi, atha muttā ca muttikaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:945_0: Rīti rīrī (ṭī.) tthī ārakūṭo vā, amalaṁ tva’bbhakaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:949_0: Kāḷatipu tu sīsañca, haritālaṁ tu pītanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:951_0: Cinapiṭṭhañca sindūraṁ, atha tūlo tathā picu;
anya-e0809n3:952_0: Khuddajaṁ tu madhu khuddaṁ, madhucchiṭṭhaṁ tu sitthakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:956_0: Usabho balībaddho balibadda (ka.) ca, goṇo govasabho vuso.
anya-e0809n3:958_0: Vuddho jaraggavo so tha, dammo vacchataro samā;
anya-e0809n3:959_0: Dhuravāhī tu dhorayho, govindo dhikato gavaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:961_0: Vaho ca khandhadeso tha, kakudho kakudo (ka.) kaku vuccate;
anya-e0809n3:962_0: Atho visāṇaṁ siṅgañca, rattagāvī tu rohiṇī.
anya-e0809n3:964_0: Gāvī ca siṅginī go ca, vañjhā tu kathyate vasā;
anya-e0809n3:968_0: Gomiḷho gomayo nitthī, atho sappi ghataṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:970_0: Navuddhaṭaṁ tu nonītaṁ, damimaṇḍaṁ tu matthu ca,
anya-e0809n3:971_0: Khīraṁ duddhaṁ payo thaññaṁ, takkaṁ tu mathitaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:973_0: Khīraṁ dadhi ghataṁ takkaṁ, nonītaṁ pañca gorasā;
anya-e0809n3:974_0: Urabbho meṇḍa mesā ca, uraṇo avi eḷako.
anya-e0809n3:978_0: Gadrabho tu kharo vutto, uraṇī tu ajī ajā.
anya-e0809n3:987_0: Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
anya-e0809n3:991_0: Rathakāro tha suvaṇṇa, kāro nāḷindhamo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1001_0: Veno vilīvakāro ca, naḷakāro samā tayo;
anya-e0809n3:1012_0: Māyā tu sambarī māyā, kāro tu indajāliko;
anya-e0809n3:1014_0: Orabbhikā sūkarikā, māgavikā te ca sākuṇikā;
anya-e0809n3:1015_0: Hantvā jīvante’ḷaka, sūkara, miga, pakkhino kamato.
anya-e0809n3:1019_0: Vetaniko tu bhatako, kammakaro tha kiṁ karo;
anya-e0809n3:1020_0: Dāso ca ceṭako pesso, bhacco ca paricāriko.
anya-e0809n3:1023_0: Dāsā karamarānīto, ccevaṁ te catudhā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1030_0: Sapāko ceva caṇḍālo, mātaṅgo sapaco bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1035_0: Sārameyyo ca sunakho, suno soṇo ca kukkuro.
anya-e0809n3:1041_0: Sābandhanaṁ tu gaddūlo, dīpako tu ca cetako;
anya-e0809n3:1042_0: Bandhanaṁ gaṇṭhi pāso tha, vāgurā vākarā (sī. ṭī.) migabandhanī.
anya-e0809n3:1044_0: Thiyaṁ kuveṇī kumīnaṁ, ānayo jāla muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1052_0: Suttaṁ tantu pume tantaṁ, potthaṁ lepyādikammani;
anya-e0809n3:1056_0: Mañjūsā peḷā piṭako, tvitthiyaṁ pacchi peṭako.
anya-e0809n3:1059_0: Upāhano vā pādu’tthī, tabbhedā pādukā pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:1066_0: Tabbhastā gaggarī nārī, sattaṁ tu pipphalaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1070_0: Kharo ca kakaco nitthī, sippaṁ kammaṁ kalādikaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1077_0: Opamma mupamānaṁ cu, pamā bhati tu nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1079_0: Nibbeso vetanaṁ mūlyaṁ, jūtaṁ tvanitthi ketavaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1082_0: Pāṭibhogotu paṭibhū, akkho tu pāsako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1083_0: Pumevā’ ṭṭhapadaṁaṭṭhāpadaṁ (ṭī. sī.) sāri, phalake tha paṇo, bbhuto.
anya-e0809n3:1085_0: Kiṇṇaṁ tu madirābīje, madhu madhvāsave mataṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1086_0: Madirā vāruṇī majjaṁ, surā bhavo tu merayaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1096_0: Araññaṁ kānanaṁ dāyo, gahanaṁ vipinaṁ vanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1100_0: Tarusaṇḍo sa ārāmo, tatho pavana muccate.
anya-e0809n3:1105_0: Panti vīthyā’vali seṇī, pāḷi lekhā tu rāji ca;
anya-e0809n3:1106_0: Pādapo viṭapī rukkho, ago sālo mahīruho.
anya-e0809n3:1108_0: Dumo taru kujo sākhī, gaccho tu khuddapādapo;
anya-e0809n3:1109_0: Phalanti ye vinā pupphaṁ, te vuccanti vanappatī.
anya-e0809n3:1113_0: Tīsu vañcyā’phalā cātha, phalino phalavā phalī.
anya-e0809n3:1115_0: Samphullito tu vikaco, phullo vikasito tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1116_0: Siro’ggaṁ sikharo nitthī, sākhā tu kathitā latā.
anya-e0809n3:1118_0: Dalaṁ palāsaṁ chadanaṁ, paṇṇaṁ pattaṁ chado pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1119_0: Pallavo vā kisalayaṁ, navubbhinne tu aṅkuro.
anya-e0809n3:1121_0: Makulaṁ vā kuṭumalo, khārako tu ca jālakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1124_0: Pasavo kusumaṁ pupphaṁ, parāgo pupphajo rajo;
anya-e0809n3:1125_0: Makarando madhu mataṁ, thavako tu ca gocchako.
anya-e0809n3:1131_0: Mallikādī tu kusume, saliṅgā vīhayo phale;
anya-e0809n3:1134_0: Mūla mārabbha sākhanto, khandho bhāgo tarussa tha;
anya-e0809n3:1135_0: Koṭaro nitthiyaṁ rukkha, cchidde kaṭṭhaṁ tu dāru ca.
anya-e0809n3:1137_0: Bundo mūlañca pādo tha, saṅku’tto khāṇunitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1138_0: Karahāṭaṁ tu kando tha, kaḷīro matthako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1140_0: Vallarī mañjarī nārī, vallī tu kathitā latā;
anya-e0809n3:1141_0: Thambho gumbo ca akkhandhe, latā virū patāninī.
anya-e0809n3:1143_0: Assattho bodhi ca dvīsu, nigrodho tu vaṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1144_0: Kabiṭṭho ca kapittho ca, yaññaṅgo tu udumbaro.
anya-e0809n3:1149_0: Dantasaṭho ca jambhīro, varaṇo tu kareri ca;
anya-e0809n3:1150_0: Kiṁ suko pālibhaddotha, vañjulo tu ca vetaso.
anya-e0809n3:1153_0: Atho guḷaphalo pīlu, sobhañjano ca siggu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1159_0: Mālūra beluvābillo, punnāgo tu ca kesaro;
anya-e0809n3:1160_0: Sālavo tu ca loddo tha, piyālo sannakaddu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1167_0: Puṇḍarīko ca setambo, selu tu bahuvārako;
anya-e0809n3:1168_0: Sepaṇṇī kāsmirī cātha, kolī ca badarītthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1176_0: Kadambo piyako nīpo, bhallī bhallātako tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1177_0: Jhāvuko piculo cātha, tilako khurako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1179_0: Ciñcā ca tintiṇī cātha, gaddabhaṇḍo kapītano;
anya-e0809n3:1183_0: Niculo mucalindo ca, nīpo tha piyako tathā;
anya-e0809n3:1188_0: Yūpo pūgo (ka.) tu kamuko cātha, paṭṭi lākhāpasādano.
anya-e0809n3:1193_0: Pakiriyo pūtiko tha, rohī rohitako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1194_0: Eraṇḍo tu ca āmaṇḍo, atha sattuphalā samī.
anya-e0809n3:1197_0: Somavakko tu kadaro, sallotu madano bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1199_0: Athāpi indasālo ca, sallakī khārako siyā;
anya-e0809n3:1200_0: Devadāru bhaddadāru, campeyyo tu ca campako.
anya-e0809n3:1206_0: Nimbo’riṭṭho pucimando, karako tu ca dāḷimo.
anya-e0809n3:1208_0: Saralo pūtikaṭṭhañca, kapilā tu ca siṁsapā;
anya-e0809n3:1209_0: Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgupi, sirīso tu ca bhaṇḍilo.
anya-e0809n3:1216_0: Tāpiñcho ca tamālo tha, kuṭajo girimallikā.
anya-e0809n3:1218_0: Indayavo phale tassā, ggimantho kaṇikā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1219_0: Niguṇṭhi’tthī sinduvāro, tiṇasuññaṁ tiṇasūlaṁ (ṭī.) tu mallikā.
anya-e0809n3:1228_0: Mātuluṅgo bījapūro, ummatto tu ca mātulo.
anya-e0809n3:1230_0: Karamando suseno ca, kundaṁ tu māghya muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1238_0: Japā tu jayasumanaṁ, karīro kakaco bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1243_0: Pūtilatā gaḷocī ca, mubbā madhurasā pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:1245_0: Kapikacchu duphasso tha, mañjiṭṭhā vikasā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1246_0: Ambaṭṭhā ca tathā pāṭhā, kaṭukā kaṭurohiṇī.
anya-e0809n3:1254_0: Nididdhikā tu byagghī ca, atha nīlī ca nīlinī;
anya-e0809n3:1255_0: Jiñjuko jiñjukā (ka.) ceva guñjā tha, satamūlī satāvarī.
anya-e0809n3:1260_0: Nuhī ceva mahānāmo, muddikā tu madhurasā;
anya-e0809n3:1261_0: Athāpi madhukaṁ yaṭṭhi, madhukāmadhuyaṭṭhikā madhulaṭṭhikā (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:1263_0: Vātiṅgaṇo ca bhaṇḍākī, vāttākī brahatī pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1264_0: Nāgabalā ceva jhasā, lāṅgalī tu ca sāradī.
anya-e0809n3:1266_0: Rambhā ca kadalī moco, kappāsī badarā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1267_0: Nāgalatā tu tambūlī, aggijālā tu dhātakī.
anya-e0809n3:1269_0: Tivutā tipuṭā cātha, sāmā kāḷā ca kathyate;
anya-e0809n3:1270_0: Atho siṅgī ca usabho, reṇukā kapiḷā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1273_0: Seleyya’ masmapupphañca, elā tu bahulā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1275_0: Kuṭṭhañca byādhi kathito, vāneyyaṁ tu kuṭannaṭaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1278_0: Mūlaṁ pattaṁ kaḷīra’ggaṁ, kandaṁ miñjā phalaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n3:1279_0: Taco pupphañca chattanti, sākaṁ dasavidhaṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1283_0: Jīvanti jīvanī cātha, madhurako ca jīvako.
anya-e0809n3:1285_0: Mahākando ca lasuṇaṁ, palaṇḍu tu sukandako;
anya-e0809n3:1286_0: Paṭolo tittako cātha, bhiṅgarājo ca makkavo.
anya-e0809n3:1289_0: Kāravello tu susavī, tumbyā’lābu ca lābu sā.
anya-e0809n3:1291_0: Eḷālukañca kakkārī, kumbhaṇḍo tu ca vallibho;
anya-e0809n3:1294_0: Mūlako nitthiyaṁ cuccu, tambako ca kalambako;
anya-e0809n3:1297_0: Saddalo ceva dubbā ca, golomī sā sitā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1298_0: Gundā ca bhaddamuttañca, rasālo tu’cchu veḷu tu.
anya-e0809n3:1300_0: Tacasāro veṇu vaṁso, pabbaṁ tu phalu gaṇṭhiso;
anya-e0809n3:1301_0: Kīcakā te siyuṁ veṇū, ye nadantyā’niladdhutā.
anya-e0809n3:1303_0: Naḷo ca dhamano poṭa, galo tu kāsa mitthi na;
anya-e0809n3:1304_0: Tejano tu saro, mūlaṁ, tū’ sīraṁ bīraṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n3:1306_0: Kuso varahisaṁ dabbo, bhūtiṇakaṁ tu bhūtiṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1310_0: Tālo vibhedikā cātha, khajjurī sindi vuccati;
anya-e0809n3:1312_0: Hintāla, tāla, khajjūrī, nālikerā tatheva ca;
anya-e0809n3:1313_0: Tālī ca ketakī nārī, pūgo ca tiṇapādapāti.
anya-e0809n3:1321_0: Viñjho paṇḍava vaṅkādī, pubbaselo tu co’dayo;
anya-e0809n3:1325_0: Kālakūṭo tikūṭā’ssa, pattho tu sānu nitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1327_0: Kūṭo vā sikharaṁ siṅgaṁ, papāto tu taṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1330_0: Darī’tthī kandaro dvīsu, leṇaṁ tu gabbharaṁ guhā;
anya-e0809n3:1331_0: Silāpokkharaṇī soṇḍī, kuñjaṁ nikuñja mitthi na.
anya-e0809n3:1333_0: Uddha madhiccakā sela, ssāsannā bhūmyu paccakā;
anya-e0809n3:1338_0: Migindo kesarī sīho, taraccho tu migādano;
anya-e0809n3:1339_0: Byaggho tu puṇḍarīko tha, saddūlo dīpinī’rito.
anya-e0809n3:1346_0: Khagga khaggavisāṇā tu, palāsādo ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:1349_0: Makkaṭo vānaro sākhā, migo kapi valīmukho;
anya-e0809n3:1353_0: Siṅgālo sigālo (sī.) jambuko kotthu, bheravo ca sivā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1354_0: Biḷāro babbu mañjāro, koko tu ca vako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1361_0: Hariṇo miga sāraṅgā, mago ajinayoni ca;
anya-e0809n3:1365_0: Eṇeyyo eṇīmigo ca, pampaṭako tu pampako;
anya-e0809n3:1366_0: Vātamigo tu calanī, mūsiko tvā’khu unduro.
anya-e0809n3:1369_0: Ruru raṅku ca nīko ca, sarabhādī migantarā.
anya-e0809n3:1372_0: Migā tu pasavo sīhā, dayo sabbacatuppadā.
anya-e0809n3:1374_0: Lūtā tu lūtikā uṇṇa, nābhi makkaṭako siyā;
anya-e0809n3:1377_0: Godhā kuṇḍo pyatho kaṇṇa, jalūkā satapadyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1378_0: Kalandako kāḷakā tha, nakulo maṅguso bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1380_0: Kakaṇṭako ca saraṭo, kīṭo tu puḷavo kimi;
anya-e0809n3:1385_0: Sakuṇo ca sakunto vi, pataṅgo sakuṇī dvijo.
anya-e0809n3:1387_0: Vakkaṅgo pattayāno ca, patanto nīḷajo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1388_0: Tabbhedā vaṭṭakā jīva, ñjīvo cakora tittirā.
anya-e0809n3:1393_0: Patattaṁ pekhuṇaṁ pattaṁ, pakkho piñchaṁ chado garu;
anya-e0809n3:1394_0: Aṇḍaṁ tu pakkhibīje tha, nīḷo nitthī kulāvakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1397_0: Yugaṁ tu yugalaṁ dvandaṁ, yamakaṁ yamalaṁ yamaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1399_0: Samūho gaṇa saṅghātā, samudāyo ca sañcayo;
anya-e0809n3:1400_0: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo.
anya-e0809n3:1402_0: Kāyo khandho samudayo, ghaṭā samiti saṁhati;
anya-e0809n3:1403_0: Rāsi puñjo samavāyo, pūgo jātaṁ kadambakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1405_0: Byūho vitāna gumbā ca, kalāpo jāla maṇḍalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1409_0: Sajātikānaṁ tu kulaṁ, nikāyo tu sadhamminaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1416_0: Kalāpī ca sikhī kekī, cūḷā tu ca sikhā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1419_0: Candako mecako cātha, chappado ca madhubbato.
anya-e0809n3:1422_0: Pārāvato kapoto ca, kakuṭo ca pārevato.
anya-e0809n3:1424_0: Gijjho gaddhotha kulalo, seno byagghīnaso pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1427_0: Uhuṅkāro ulūko ca, kosiyo vāyasāri ca;
anya-e0809n3:1428_0: Kāko tva’riṭṭho dhaṅko ca, balipuṭṭho ca vāyaso.
anya-e0809n3:1435_0: Suvo tu kīro ca suko, tambacūḷo tu kukkuṭo.
anya-e0809n3:1437_0: Vanakukkuṭo ca nijjivho, atha koñcā ca kuntanī;
anya-e0809n3:1438_0: Cakkavāko tu cakkavho, sāraṅgotu ca cātako.
anya-e0809n3:1445_0: Lohapiṭṭho tathā kaṅko, khañjarīṭo tu khañjano;
anya-e0809n3:1446_0: Kalaviṅko tu cāṭako, dindibho tu kikī bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1455_0: Sūcimukho ca makaso, cīrī tu jhallikā jhillikā (ka.) tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:1456_0: Jatukā jinapattā tha, haṁso setacchado bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1465_0: Randhaṁ tu vivaraṁ chiddaṁ, kuharaṁ susiraṁ bilaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1467_0: Susi’tthī chiggalaṁ sobbhaṁ, sacchidde susiraṁ tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1468_0: Thiyaṁ tu kāsu āvāṭo, sapparājā tu vāsukī.
anya-e0809n3:1475_0: Silutto gharasappo tha, nīlasappo silābhu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1478_0: Sarīsapo phaṇī sappā, lagaddā bhogi pannagā.
anya-e0809n3:1480_0: Dvijivho urago vāḷo, dīgho ca dīghapiṭṭhiko;
anya-e0809n3:1481_0: Pādūdaro visadharo, bhogo tu phaṇino tanu.
anya-e0809n3:1483_0: Āsī’tthī sappadāṭhā tha, nimmoko kañcuko samā;
anya-e0809n3:1484_0: Visaṁ tva’nitthī garaḷaṁ, tabbhedā vā halāhalo.
anya-e0809n3:1488_0: Nirayo duggati’tthī ca, narako, so mahā’ṭṭhadhā;
anya-e0809n3:1492_0: Thiyaṁ vetaraṇī loha, kumbhī tattha jalāsayā;
anya-e0809n3:1501_0: Thevo tu bindu phusitaṁ, bhamo tu jalaniggamo.
anya-e0809n3:1503_0: Āpo payo jalaṁ vāri, pānīyaṁ salilaṁ dakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1504_0: Aṇṇo nīraṁ vanaṁ vālaṁ, toyaṁ ambu’dakañca kaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1506_0: Taraṅgo ca tathā bhaṅgo, ūmi vīci pumitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1507_0: Ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcīsu kathyate.
anya-e0809n3:1509_0: Jambālo kalalaṁ paṅko, cikkhallaṁ kaddamo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1510_0: Pulinaṁ vālukā vaṇṇu, marū’ru sikatā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1513_0: Tīraṁ tu kūlaṁ rodhañca, patīrañca taṭaṁ tisu.
anya-e0809n3:1515_0: Pāraṁ paramhi tīramhi, oraṁ tva’pāra muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1516_0: Uḷumpo uḷupo (ka.) tu plavo kullo, taro ca paccarī’tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1518_0: Taraṇī tari nāvā ca, kūpako tu ca kumbhakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1526_0: Poto pavahanaṁ vuttaṁ, doṇi tvi’tthī tathā’mbaṇaṁ ammaṇaṁ (sī.).
anya-e0809n3:1528_0: Gabhīra ninna gambhīrā, tho ttānaṁ tabbipakkhake;
anya-e0809n3:1532_0: Dhīvaro macchiko maccha, bandha kevaṭṭa jālikā.
anya-e0809n3:1535_0: Rohito magguro siṅgī, balajo muñja pāvusā.
anya-e0809n3:1537_0: Sattavaṅko savaṅko ca, naḷamīno ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:1543_0: Pāsāṇamaccho pāṭhīno, vaṅko tu baḷiso bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1547_0: Kakkaṭako kuḷīro ca, jalūkā tu ca rattapā;
anya-e0809n3:1551_0: Atha sippī ca sutti’tthī, saṅkhe tu kambu’nitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1554_0: Jalāsayo jalādhāro, gambhīro rahado tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:1557_0: Taḷāko ca saro’nitthī, vāpī ca sarasī’tthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1560_0: Anotatto tathā kaṇṇa, muṇḍo ca rathakārako;
anya-e0809n3:1561_0: Chaddanto ca kuṇālo ca, vuttā mandākinī’tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1564_0: Āhāvo tu nipānañcā, khātaṁ tu devakhātakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1566_0: Savantī ninnagā sindhu, saritā āpagā nadī;
anya-e0809n3:1567_0: Bhāgīrathī tu gaṅgā tha, sambhedo sindhusaṅgamo.
anya-e0809n3:1569_0: Gaṅgā’ciravatī ceva, yamunā sarabhū (sarabū sarayū (ka.) ) mahī;
anya-e0809n3:1570_0: Imā mahānadī pañca, candabhāgā sarassatī sarasvatī (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:1572_0: Nerañjarā ca kāverī, nammadādī ca ninnagā;
anya-e0809n3:1573_0: Vārimaggo paṇālī’tthī panāḷī (ṭī.), pume candanikā tu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1578_0: Anitthī padumaṁ paṅke, ruhaṁ nalina pokkharaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1582_0: Kiñjakkho kesaro nitthī, daṇḍo tu nāla muccate.
anya-e0809n3:1584_0: Bhisaṁ muḷālo nitthī ca, bījakoso tu kaṇṇikā;
